com.nus.cool.storageservice

Interface StorageService


  • public interface StorageService
    Storage Service defines external file storage services that can be connected to COOL for loading and storing data. This allows offloading the responsibility of availability, persistence, fault tolerance of data to the storage service.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StorageServiceStatus loadCube(java.lang.String cube, java.nio.file.Path destDir)
      Compared to loadData, the destDir is expected to follow the cube directory organization.
      StorageServiceStatus loadData(java.lang.String id, java.nio.file.Path destDir)
      Load the data in storage service with the designated id to destDir.
      StorageServiceStatus storeCube(java.lang.String cube, java.nio.file.Path srcDir)
      Compared to storeData, the srcDir is expected to follow the cube directory organization.
      StorageServiceStatus storeData(java.lang.String id, java.nio.file.Path srcDir)
      Store the file(s) under destDir in storage service with the designated id.

    • Method Detail

      • loadCube

        StorageServiceStatus loadCube(java.lang.String cube,
                              java.nio.file.Path destDir)
        Compared to loadData, the destDir is expected to follow the cube directory organization. This allows only more efficient implementation. (for example only loading the new versions of a cube)
        Parameters:
        cube - : name for the cube in storage service
        destDir - : path to the cube to store

      • loadData

        StorageServiceStatus loadData(java.lang.String id,
                              java.nio.file.Path destDir)
        Load the data in storage service with the designated id to destDir.
        Parameters:
        id - : name for the cube in storage service
        destDir - : path to the cube to store

      • storeCube

        StorageServiceStatus storeCube(java.lang.String cube,
                               java.nio.file.Path srcDir)
        Compared to storeData, the srcDir is expected to follow the cube directory organization. This allows more efficient implementation customized for COOL cube.
        Parameters:
        cube - : name for the cube in storage service
        srcDir - : path to the cube to store

      • storeData

        StorageServiceStatus storeData(java.lang.String id,
                               java.nio.file.Path srcDir)
        Store the file(s) under destDir in storage service with the designated id.
        Parameters:
        id - : name for the cube in storage service
        srcDir - : path to the cube to store
